Abilities.Effect: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals double your momentum.
Before you play an attack as a Reversal, if that attack's difficulty is less than your momentum, the control check for that attack is successful (no control check necessary).

If you play an attack as a Reversal after this attack resolves, that Reversal gets +X speed and +X damage. X equals your momentum. After that attack you may not play any more attacks as Reversals this turn.
Your attack gets +X speed. X equals your momentum minus your opponent's momentum (minimum 0). Any player may play this ability.
This attack gets +X speed. X equals either the speed of the attack preceding this attack in your card pool or your momentum, whichever is higher.
Before you clear this card from your card pool during your End Phase, you may add 1 Reversal from your card pool to your hand.
You may only play this card if you have at least 1 other card in your card pool.
This attack gets +X speed. X equals your momentum minus the number of cards in your hand.
This attack's speed is equals to your momentum. Only playable if your momentum is greater than this attack's speed. This may not increase the speed to more than double the printed speed.
Your attack played as a Reversal gets +X speed. X equals that attack's printed speed. If your Reversal deals damage, add it to your hand. You may only play 1 more attack as a Reversal this turn.
Your attack either gets +2 speed or +2 damage (your choice).
Before you take damage from your opponent's attack, gain X vitality. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
After your opponent adds any number of cards to their momentum, add up to X foundations or assets from your staging area to your momentum. X equals the number of cards added by your opponent.
Before your opponent's unblocked attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals double the number of cards in your hand minus the number of cards in your opponent's hand (minimum 0).
Add 1 non-character card from your staging area to your hand. Any player may play this ability.
Before your opponent's unblocked attack deals damage to you, gain 2 vitality. Any player may play this ability.

After any player successfully plays an ability, if that ability has already been played this turn, whether printed on the same card or another card with the same name, that player must make a control check against difficulty 6. If that check fails, cancel that ability's effects.
If this attack deals damage, choose a card in your opponent's staging area. If there is another copy of that card in play (including your staging area), destroy that card.

While this card is in your card pool, after your opponent plays an ability they have already played this turn, you may discard this card from your card pool. If you do, your opponent must make a control check against a difficulty of 6. If that check fails, cancel that ability's effects.
After you add this card to your momentum during your End Phase, add X cards from the top of your deck to your momentum. X equals the difference between your momentum and your opponent's momentum.

After your attack deals 4 or less damage, draw 1 card. If your attack is a kick, draw 2 cards instead.
Discard all attacks from both players' card pools. Each player draws X cards. X equals the number of attacks discarded from either player's card pool due to this ability (your choice).

After your opponent plays an attack (not as a block), they commit X cards in their staging area. X equals the difference between the number of cards in your hand and the number of cards in your opponent's hand.

If this attack deals damage, choose 1 asset or foundation in your opponent's staging area. The chosen asset or foundation does not ready during your opponent's next Ready Step.
If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, take up to 2 Reversals from your discard pile and add them to your hand. Discard 2 cards at the end of this turn.
If this attack deals damage, any of your opponent's foundations that are committed when the damage is dealt do not ready during their next Ready Step.
Add 1 other attack played as a Reversal from your card pool to your hand. Discard 1 card at the end of this turn.

Your opponent's attack is unblockable. After their attack deals damage, you may play a Reversal from your hand as though their attack was blocked. If that Reversal deals damage, add it from your card pool to your hand.
